alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued July 27 at 2:19AM CDT until July 27 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MDT /9 AM CDT/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Reduced visibility associated with patchy dense fog. * WHERE...In Kansas, Cheyenne, Rawlins, Decatur and Norton Counties. In Nebraska, Dundy, Hitchcock and Red Willow Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MDT /9 AM CDT/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions associated with sudden, rapid reductions in visibility.
info.instruction: Drivers are urged to slow down and exercise additional caution, particularly at intersections and highway on-ramps and off-ramps where accidents are more likely to occur. Use low beam headlights and be prepared for rapid reductions in visibility, especially near rivers, creeks and other low lying areas.
